title: Black Fox II: Price of Peace | FULL MOVIE | 1995 | Western | Christopher Reeve

sources.title: Black Fox II: Price of Peace | FULL MOVIE | 1995 | Western | Christopher Reeve
sources.description:
The second in a series of three movies that tell the story of two “blood” brothers, Alan and Britt Johnson--one a former plantation owner, the other his childhood friend whom he freed from slavery. With their families, they leave Carolina to settle in Texas in the 1860’s.

Watch the first Black Fox movie if you missed it: https://youtu.be/GI2TFFWrBlc

Christopher Reeve
Raoul Trujillo
Tony Todd
Janet Bailey
Nancy Sorel
Chris Wiggins
Cynthia Preston

1995
Directed by Steven Hilliard Stern

Action
Western
Adventure
